comments.style: Google Style (""" Content begins on the next line.)
comments.no_redundant_comments: Prohibit unnecessary comments for simple changes

architecture.model_naming: Schema/Database models are clearly distinguished by Prefix/Suffix
architecture.utilities: Common utilities are separated into the utils package.
architecture.imports: Prohibited: Using relative paths such as .base in import statements
architecture.no_dataclass: @dataclass cannot be used; replace with Pydantic model and move to schemas.
architecture.no_import_error_hack: try-except ImportError: Never use as a stopgap solution

required: Do not ignore errors unrelated to corrections; all errors that occur must be corrected (skipping is prohibited).

After each task is completed, save to ChromaDB memory (required)
tools: For Sentry-integrated projects, check issues raised in Sentry.
When testing backend/frontend, start/stop the server using the server command in the hooks.py script.
validation: Passes mypy or tsc type checking
important: Evidence first: When uncertain, verify by reading files or conducting web searches before responding; never provide speculative answers.

completion_checklist: Test execution and verification of successful completion
